name: Play Your Strength Hair Repair Routine Set
about: What it is:A bond-fortifying set featuring full sizes of The Kure Bond Repair Shampoo, Conditioner, and Mask..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Strengthens and reduces breakage.Highlighted Ingredients:- Bond-Fortifying Technology: An innovative complex that targets the most abundant bonds in hair..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Strengthen your strands with this three-piece routine set to send breakage and damage home for the holidays. This limited-edition gift set comes complete with full sizes of the Kure Strength Repair Shampoo, Conditioner, and mask all formulated with bond fortifying technology for up to 5.6 times stronger hair with up to 55 percent less breakage..Fragrance Description:A blend of warm vanilla, spicy sweet clover, and fresh citrus...Clinical Results:The Kure Intense Bond Repair Mask: In a test, when using the mask, hair is clinically shown to be:.This Set Contains:- 9.2 oz/ 275 mL The Kure Bond Repair Shampoo.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Bond-Fortifying Technology: An innovative complex that targets the most abundant bonds in hair..-Vegan Proteins: Made up of essential amino acids that can provide keratin-like benefits..-Plant Butters: Feature vitamin-rich mango butter, borage oil, and shea butter. ..The Kure Bond Repair Shampoo:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage/Bourrache) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado/Avocat) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango/Mangue) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea/Karite) Butter, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender/Lavande) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria/Matricaire) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary/Romarin) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Aminomethyl Propanol, Bis-PCA Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Gluconate, Disodium PEG-12 Dimethicone Sulfosuccinate, PEG-12 Dimethicone, PEG-150 Distearate, Polyquaternium-10, Polyquaternium-7, Polysorbate 20, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Citric Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzoic Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage/Bourrache) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango/Mangue) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea/Karite) Butter, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Aminomethyl Propanol, Bis-PCA Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-16 Pareth-9, Caprylyl how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.The Kure Bond Repair Shampoo and Conditioner: .-Massage through wet hair. .-Rinse...The Kure Intense Bond Repair Mask: .-Massage through wet hair. .-Let penetrate for ten minutes. .-Rinse well... Recycling Instructions:.-TerraCycle and amika joined forces to create a free national recycling program for amikau2019s hair care packaging..-Save your empties, print a free shipping label, and send back your packaging to give it a new life. Learn more and sign up at terracycle.com/en-US/brigades/amika.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a used product, box was open and hair mask has a giant fingerprint in the middle ud83dude2d did get a refund but disappointed that itu2019s out of stock and I canu2019t reorder it :(

reviews.review_text: Got it as a gift and it was perfect my sister loved it.
